title: "My Virtual Sketchbook"
lightbox: auto
---

When I am not at work or class I love doing art! I started drawing seriously during covid 2020 summer. I was so bored and this hobby filled my time. When I realized I was pretty good at this, I started selling portraits to friends and family members. I made a small buisiness out of it until the demand for constant orders started making me lose the joy and relaxation that I found in art in the first place. I stopped selling custom art orders and now just draw for fun! It is still one of my favorite ways to spend an afternoon.
